titleStmt.title: Poor Robin's prophecy being a true astronomical prediction on the beginning, continuance, and catastrophe of the ensuing year 1679, and what will be the principal actions therein.
titleStmt.author: Poor Robin.
Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.

notesStmt.note: Winstanley is usually credited with authorship of the "Poor Robin" pamphlets, although imitators wrote some of them. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
